name: Small Might
description:
SMALL MIGHT - Entry for #LOWREZJAM 2021

The spiders took over the power plant! What are they trying to do?

Jump up high in the sky with the mightiest grasshopper there is, SMALL MIGHT! Levels full of actions await, go past the spiders' dangerous attacks, stop their leader, ANARCHID, and save the day!

____________________________________________

Liked the game? Don't forget to rate it HERE!

Special thanks to Jack Oatley and Matharoo for hosting this great jam and to every participant for their helpful feedback!

___________________________________________

IMPORTANT (8/15/2021): The download has been updated yet again, with a recently found bug fixed. Make sure you redownload the latest version.  Sorry for the inconvenience.
